 OpalAlign"

{ "templates": [ { "type": "SMS", "waitDays": 7, "order": 1, "template": "Hi {PatientName}, .", "communicationType": "text", "nextStep": 1002 }, { "type": "Email", "waitDays": 14, "order": 2, "template": "

Payment Reminder

Dear {PatientName},

This is a friendly reminder about your outstanding balance of {Balance}.

Please contact us to arrange payment at your earliest convenience.

Thank you,
{PracticeName}

Contact us: {PracticePhone} | {PracticeEmail}

", "subject": "Payment Reminder - {PracticeName}", "communicationType": "email", "nextStep": 1003 }, { "type": "Mail", "waitDays": 30, "order": 3, "template": "Final notice for balance of {Balance}", "subject": "Final Payment Notice", "communicationType": "mail", "nextStep": null }, { "type": "PhoneScript", "waitDays": 21, "order": 4, "template": "Call script: Hello, this is {PracticeName} calling about your balance...", "communicationType": "phone", "nextStep": null } ] }

body.raw:
{
    "templates": [
        {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "Message for follow-ups",
            "type": "SMS",
            "waitDays": null,
            "order": null,
            "template": "Hi {patientName}, we noticed you missed your appointment.\nPlease call us to reschedule at your earliest convenience.\nThanks\n\nThank you",
            "subject": "",
            "communicationType": null,
            "isActive": true,
            "txnProblemTypeKey": 4
        },
        {
            "id": 5,
            "name": "Message template for reappointment reminders",
            "type": "SMS",
            "waitDays": null,
            "order": null,
            "template": "Hi {patientName}, it's time for your follow-up appointment. Please call us to schedule your next visit.",
            "subject": "",
            "communicationType": null,
            "isActive": true,
            "txnProblemTypeKey": 5
        },
        {
            "id": 4,
            "name": "Message template for declined treatment follow-ups",
            "type": "SMS",
            "waitDays": null,
            "order": null,
            "template": "Hello {patientName}, we wanted to follow up on your declined treatment.\n Please let us know if you have any questions.\n\nThanks,\nJohn",
            "subject": "",
            "communicationType": null,
            "isActive": true,
            "txnProblemTypeKey": 6
        },
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Message template for unscheduled treatment reminders",
            "type": "SMS",
            "waitDays": null,
            "order": null,
            "template": "Hello {patientName},  we are reaching out because you have unscheduled treatment here at Advanced Dental Arts Wesley Chapel. \n\nPlease give us a call at 813-973-8555, to get unscheduled treatment scheduled or you can book directly online: https: //rwl.io/40y5OG8.\n\nThank you and we look forward to taking care of you!",                                                                                                     
            "subject": "",
            "communicationType": null,
            "isActive": true,
            "txnProblemTypeKey": 7
        },
        {
            "id": 3,
            "name": "Message template for overdue appointment reminders",
            "type": "SMS",
            "waitDays": null,
            "order": null,
            "template": "Hello {patientName}, you have an overdue appointment. Please contact us to schedule a new appointment.",
            "subject": "",
            "communicationType": null,
            "isActive": true,
            "txnProblemTypeKey": 8
        }
    ]
}
